column4: Just grab the alternate CD (of Ubuntu), install CLI-only, then install Kubuntu overtop

that's true.. and although I could run the commands for pure kde after .. well I was hoping for a cleaner method.. downloading now and speed is varying between 1.5MB/sec to 300 KB/sec  and half way done.. guess I'll put it on my usb stick. :)
I was going to say, if you need it, I'll bring you one :)
yea.. I heard there are extras!
